entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.1°C

Visibility: 3.2 km

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
